title: Nocs Zoom Tube monocular shows a better view of what’s ahead (and right in front of you)
content:
The new NOCS Zoom Tube monocular is a single eye version of their rugged outdoor binoculars, and it looks like the perfect backcountry adventure tool for scoping the route ahead. Like the binoculars, this sporty monocular uses Swiss-designed Bak4 prisms to amplify the image 8x while still having a super short minimum focus distance of […]
